model.title: ğŸ¦ The New Way to Build Without Banks
model.subtitle: Simple. Fair. Revolutionary.
model.description: Revolutionary partnership approach with ${total_revenue}+ projected revenue
what_it_is: Instead of borrowing money from banks, we team up with builders and professionals
Everyone who helps build gets to own a piece of the building
When the building makes money, everyone gets paid
how_to_join: Your Work = Your Share: Do plumbing? Get ownership. Do marketing? Get ownership.
No Money Needed: Just bring your skills, or bring money and skills for bigger ownership
You Help Decide: Have a say in things you know about
how_you_make_money: Monthly Income: Get paid every month from rent collected
Sale Profits: Get paid when building sells
Value Growth: Your share grows in value over time
Tax Savings: Save money on taxes (like any business owner)
Discounted Units: Buy your own residential unit at deep discount
STR Hotel Access: Own hospitality suites for long-term rental income with tax benefits
why_its_faster: No Bank Delays: No waiting for bank approvals (saves 6-12 months)
No Paperwork: No bank paperwork or meetings
Quick Start: Everyone starts working right away
Fast Decisions: Decisions made quickly by the team
real_examples: Miami Building: 75 apartments, expecting $38 million in sales
Your Future: Join one project, then another, build wealth
who_can_join: Cash Partners: Pay for city development fees, materials & professionals we couldn't get as partners
why_it_works: Everyone Invested: Everyone wants the project to succeed (we all own it!)
Better Quality: Better work quality (protecting our investment)
No Debt Stress: No debt hanging over the project
bottom_line: You work, you own, you earn
No banks, no debt, no delays
Build wealth without needing cash upfront
Be a business owner, not just a worker
model.simple_summary: It's simple: We're all partners building together, sharing the profits together!

gage_exclusive.title: ğŸ‘‘ Gage - Exclusive Ground-Level Partnership
gage_exclusive.subtitle: Current Tenant | Future Pillar Partner
gage_exclusive.intro_description: As our current tenant at 2829 Niagara, you have first-hand knowledge of this location's potential. We're offering you an exclusive ground-level partnership opportunity in what could become a multi-billion dollar scalable development model.
current_building_benefits: Hot Sauna & Massage Buildout: We'll provide website development and marketing assistance
Long-term Lease Security: Guaranteed lease until new development begins
Pro-rata Protection: If excavation starts early, you'll receive proportional compensation
Zero Investment Risk: We help you grow your current business while planning future partnership
partnership_benefits: Founding Partner Status: Get in on the ground floor of a revolutionary development model
Commission Structure: Earn commissions on every partner you bring to the table
Sub-contractor Network: Convert your existing sub-contractors into partners
Prime Commercial Space: Lucrative rental terms in the new building for your wellness business
STR Hotel Unit Access: Take advantage of short-term rental opportunities
Tax Benefits: Depreciation advantages and investment tax benefits
Equity Growth: Share in $38M+ projected revenue as a founding partner
Future Projects: Priority access to upcoming developments in the scalable model
financial_highlights: Your Equity Share: Based on contribution level (cash, services, or hybrid)
Partner Recruitment Bonus: Commission on successful partner referrals
Commercial Space ROI: Premium location for wellness/spa services
STR Revenue Share: Participate in hotel room revenue streams
gage_exclusive.scaling_description: This isn't just one building - it's a proven model that can scale across multiple markets. As a ground-level partner, you'll have opportunities in future developments, creating a portfolio of equity positions.
action_items: Current Business Protection: Let's discuss your sauna/massage buildout plans
Partnership Structure: Review contribution options (cash, services, hybrid)
Network Assessment: Identify sub-contractors who could become partners
Timeline Planning: Align your business growth with development schedule
exclusive_terms: No Upfront Risk: Continue current operations while we plan transition
Marketing Support: Website and promotional assistance for current business
Lease Protection: Guaranteed terms until construction begins
Priority Positioning: First choice of commercial space in new building
Founding Partner Benefits: Enhanced profit sharing as early adopter
